description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base with sample CV documents, sets up a vector database using Qdrant, and performs a filtered query through an agent. It includes downloading sample data, configuring metadata for filtering, and executing a search query.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs searches.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF documents, supporting metadata filtering.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A class representing the Qdrant vector database client.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for knowledge base initialization.
